New Records: Adolis Garcia became the first player in LCS history to have both a Golden Sombrero and a grand slam in a nine-inning postseason game
Key Match Events: Adolis Garcia hit a grand slam in the ninth inning with the bases loaded, turning the crowd's boos into silence and securing the Rangers' victory
Post-Match Reflections: Jonah Heim praised Garcia's resilience, noting that Garcia's performance silenced the crowd and gave the team confidence for the next game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked the first LCS game from the same state to go to seven games
